messages.title: VOTE FOR CHANGE
messages.content: In the last elections, the Liberal Democrats forced a number of recounts. Every vote for me and the local Conservative team is a step closer to getting the change we need.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting red tape to help create new jobs.
New recycling services and keep weekly black bag collections.
Faster access to GPs and dentists.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In the last elections, the Liberal Democrats forced a number of recounts. Conservative support needed for change.

issues.economy: Cutting red tape to help create new jobs.
issues.environment: New recycling services and keep weekly black bag collections.
issues.health: Faster access to GPs and dentists.

housing.content: We will fight plan to build on local playing fields.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a dad of two young children I understand... We should demand better for our children.
